parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the row you want to delete

parameters.name: IncludeHidden
parameters.description: True to delete the hidden row, false to not

title: ITableAnnotation.DeleteRow2
description: Deletes the specified row from this table.
signature:
System.Boolean DeleteRow2( 
   System.Int32
Index
,
   System.Boolean
IncludeHidden
)

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the row you want to delete

parameters.name: IncludeHidden
parameters.description: True to delete the hidden row, false to not

returns: True if the row is deleted successfully, false if not
remarks:
The index for both the rows and columns is 0-based.
This method deletes the entire table if you try to delete the only row in the table.
